Sentencas: A High-Temperature Metal Air Battery (HTMAB) that operates based on a simple redox reaction between molten metal and atmospheric oxygen at 600-1000 degrees C is presented.
Titulo: Performance and stability of a liquid anode high-temperature metal-air battery

Sentencas: This innovative HTMAB concept combines the technology of conventional metal-air batteries with that of solid oxide fuel cells to provide a high energy density system for many applications.
Titulo: Performance and stability of a liquid anode high-temperature metal-air battery

Sentencas: Electrochemical reversibility is demonstrated with 95% coulomb efficiency.
Titulo: Performance and stability of a liquid anode high-temperature metal-air battery

Sentencas: Cell sealing has been identified as a key issue in order to determine the end-of-charge voltage, enhance coulomb efficiency and ensure long term stability.
Titulo: Performance and stability of a liquid anode high-temperature metal-air battery

Sentencas: In this work, molten Sn is selected as anode material.
Titulo: Performance and stability of a liquid anode high-temperature metal-air battery

Sentencas: Low utilization of the stored material due to precipitation of the SnO2 on the electrochemically active area limits the expected capacity, which' should theoretically approach 903 mAh g(-1).
Titulo: Performance and stability of a liquid anode high-temperature metal-air battery

Sentencas: Nevertheless, more than 1000 charge/discharge cycles are performed during more than 1000 h at 800 degrees C, showing highly promising results of stability, reversibility and cyclability.
Titulo: Performance and stability of a liquid anode high-temperature metal-air battery
